issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Add elt hive function to gandiva
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14011](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14011). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Return string at index number. For example elt(2,'hello','world') returns 'world'. Returns NULL if N is less than 1 or greater than the number of arguments.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14011?focusedCommentId=17447837) by Pindikura Ravindra (pravindra):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11166
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11166>
